ctx: intros p a b H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: unfold zeroP, eqP, minusTerm, minuspf, mults, minusP in *.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce eqP to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros p a b H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a" in the current goal.

original: intros p a b H1 H2. unfold zeroP, eqP, minusTerm, minuspf, mults, minusP in *. rewrite H1, H2. reflexivity.
